entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy with a few rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
